name: The Mighty Quest For Epic Loot
summary: The Mighty Quest for Epic Loot is a brand new Free-to-Play IP from Ubisoft Montreal for the PC that thrusts you in an outrageous medieval fantasy world called Opulencia where wealth, status and showboating are the name of the game! As a newcomer to Opulencia, you will get to know your greedy neighbors quickly as they will like nothing more than take all that you have. Everyone’s out to have the nicest castle…at any cost, so you’ll quickly learn the ropes on what it takes to be the richest and most envied hero of the land!
info:
• 中文名: 城堡抢翻天
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 官方网站: https://www.themightyquest.com/
